Name: The Moment
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with prosecco.
Review: Take the time to juice a fresh pomegranate to make this dry fruity long drink and you'll be thankful you did. Pomegranate combines brilliantly with the rum and the other ingredients adding depth and complexity.
History: Adapted from a recipe created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Pawan Singh Rawat at Grappa Bar - Shangri-La Eros Hotel, New Delhi, India. Pawan's original recipe was based on Bacardi Carta Blanca rum .
Nutrition: One serving of The Moment contains 237 calories
